Half Life Opposing Force вышел 20 лет назад, этот аддон настолько стар... но данный аддон великолепен, это хороший пример аддона. Opposing Force повествует о бойце HECU Адриан Шепарде который вместе со своим отрядом высаживаются в лаборатории Black Mes'у, это довольно интересный метод повествования от другого лица который на стороне вражеских сил, но увы Адриан Шепард "хороший" солдат, а не те бойцы HECU из Half-Life 1 которые безжалостно убивали научных сотрудников
Оценка  8/10

This is how you do an expansion pack.

This game the same amount, if not more gameplay than the original HL. Not only does this game include a brand new story, but introduces new and unique weapons and foes. New mechanics are introduced that make the game a blast to play, while still keeping the core gameplay that HL1 offered. Quite honestly, this game is better than the game than HL1, though I still strongly suggest playing it or else you will be lost in the plot. Although the graphics and engine are dated by modern standards, it is still a great experience.
Understandable, have a great day

Esta expansión es increíble, parece un juego totalmente nuevo. Empezaré diciendo que es la expansión mas variada, puesto que aparecen nuevos enemigos (nuevos humanos y aliens), te dan armas nuevas, las cuales son muy divertidas y útiles. Ahora eres un militar, lo que agrega nuevos compañeros, como los militares médicos y los que derriban puertas. La historia es increíble y te va a sorprender. Puede que tenga algún fallo en el doblaje al español (esto se puede arreglar con guias de la comunidad) y algún que otro error de la IA. Si te gustó Half Life, te encantará Opposing Force.

Although I bought this when I was 10, I didn't get round to it for 20 years. 

I think this game has a really nice level of difficulty. Playing on hard was challenging, but not frustrating apart from the occasional Worms-esque moment when an enemy throws a grenade vertically 15ft through 2 doorways only for it to land perfectly on your face. Clearing a dark warehouse crawling with semi-invisible black ops feels great.  

Not crazy about all of the new weapons, found myself only using the detached Barnacle when absolutely necessary, same goes for the Desert Eagle, and Spore Launcher. Also, while it's not exactly HL's thing, more sniper ammo would've been pretty gosh darn sexy.

It took me about 10 hours to complete on hard, well worth the 99p I paid for it. The only thing that really hindered me was the occasional crashes; at certain points, be they particular rooms or particular corridors if I was using deployable explosives, sometimes the game just crashes. I'd also occasionally get stuck on the landscape, particularly during the kinda fiddley platform sections.  

All in all, there's so much classic HL action to be had here - really solid campaign. The finale is a bit of a damp squib, wet fart of an affair, but still so worth it if like me you sat on it for 2/3rds of your life. 

Oh and a really common criticism of this is that it breaks canon... but... like... so? it's a spin-off! It's good!

A great addition to an already great game. Half-Life: Opposing Force puts you right into the shoes of Adrian Shepard, a member of the military who helped in cleansing the aliens out of Black Mesa. The game is certainly a nice change of pace and is closely tied to the original Half-Life. I must recommend if you love the series or are just finishing up the first game.

Half-Life Opposing Force 1999 / 16 Horas de juego en modo desconectado 
Una expansión del videojuego Half-Life donde explica más sobre las historia del videojuego.
En este análisis de te digo porque es recomendable comprar es esta expansión o DLC.
La expansión esta 4.98 dólares (Lo pongo en dólares para que sea en general) y tiene modo campaña y modo multijugador que es muy parecido al videojuego Half-Life, su modo campaña es muy disfrutable pero hay momentos que se vuelve aburrido pero después hay momentos que son muy disfrutable y sigues con la aventura, esta expansión incluye nuevos enemigos y nuevas armas que lo hace fascinante 
Los bugs redujeron a diferencia del juego general que es Half-Life, pero el único bugs que yo encontré es del autoguardado que puede hasta sacarte del juego, por eso yo recomiendo hacer el guardado rápido.
El modo campaña puede durar 16 o 20 horas dependiendo de cómo avances en el videojuego y su dificultad que es elegido.
Su multijugador es muy disfrutable que puedes estar como 2 o 3 hora jugando, hay demasiados servidores para disfrutar de su multijugador.
Es recomendable comprar esta expansión?
7/10

[h1][b]Half-Life: Opposing Force[/b] - хороший аддон до хорошої гри.[/h1]

Half-Life: Opposing Force - це хороша добавка тим, кому хочеться більше гейплею оригінальної Half-Life. Чесно, сказати про нього багато чого не можу. В ньому є своя сюжетна лінія, нові противники, головоломки і боси. Є й свої проблеми, які здебільшого пов’язані з геймдизайном тих років. Та насправді переваг достатньо щоб заново зануритись в шутерний геймплей на двигуні Sorce. А 6 годин геймплею подарують вам пару вечорів ностальгії.
A great addition to HL1 with a decent amount of new puzzles, new baddies and new weapons to vanquish them with. Fast paced, challenging and fun.

Opposing Force is a pretty decent expansion to the Half-Life series. Level design can be confusing and not as streamlined as HL. There are new NPCs and a ton of new weapons, which is nice. I like the first boss fight arena and puzzle you have to solve to defeat it. The arena had that classic Half-Life feel. Unfortunately, the same can't be said about the final boss. The arena felt lazy and lacked anything interesting other than a soft body rope. While the rope was cool to look at, it's not fun to climb, which you have to do every time you want to damage the boss. While there's more content in Opposing Force, I much prefer the aesthetics of Blue Shift.

Anyway, good game, I shouldn't have to tell you to buy it, because you probably own it...so in that case, go play it!
